lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Now, this sounds like they're going to join the group and buy themselves out," said Edward Atorino, media analyst with Smith Barney, Harris Upham and Co.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "If indeed, the reason Dudley Taft is no longer president is because the bass group tossed him out, I couldn't see them backing him on any deal," said one analyst, who asked not to be identified.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: At the time, the company said it authorized its adviser, Goldman, Sachs and Co, to explore other takeover proposals and to supply financial data to other interested bidders.
